Pre-Game Insights: Germany will look to flip the script by winning the crown on home turf after back-to-back World Cup group stage exits and a disappointing round of 16 loss to England in Euro 2020.
Germany defender Antonio Rüdiger emphasized the importance of being humble and focusing on the first match.
Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann expressed anticipation for the huge event, noting that the whole world will be watching.
Scotland forward Ryan Christie highlighted the excitement of playing in the opening match and acknowledged Germany as an amazing team.
Scotland aims to reach the knockout stage for the first time, which would be a historic achievement for the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The mascot ‘Albaert’ of the upcoming UEFA Euro 2024 European Football Championship was seen in Berlin on June 13, 2024.
The sound of bagpipes and men in kilts on the streets of Munich indicated the presence of Scottish fans.
Germany has another motivation to win the trophy on its own turf, as Deniz Undav joked about shaving Thomas Müller's head if they become European champions.
